snippet.title: Sonic Adventure (Dreamcast) Intro
snippet.description:
This is the intro to Sonic Adventure for the Dreamcast.

Ten years ago today (on September 9, 1999), the Sega Dreamcast was released in the U.S. Probably the game that everyone got on launch day was Sonic Adventure. The game is still considered to be one the Dreamcast's best games.

Feel free to post your thoughts and memories of Sonic Adventure and the Dreamcast.
